resources.string: Enable bluetooth tethering when device booted.

Thank you downloaded. 
 This app is an auxiliary application for switching convenient tethering set of Android devices.
 Current features, bluetooth tethering auto-enable the terminal startup.
 
 For verification devices is low, it may does not work.
 We will respond if you can feedback.
 Thank you very much in advance.
 
 Function planning to add future
 • Automatic switching of the Wi-Fi tethering
 • Switching from the notification / widget
 • Switching from the Android Wear
 • Automatic switching of USB tethering(requires rooted)
 
 @wasnot_apps
